title: ORIENT
description: (Book 3 of 4), Alexandra's Story Continues...  What does it all mean?  The family and the search for meaning keeps expanding, and it’s all just a matter of keeping it all in order.  Goal oriented and ambitious women don’t just sit around waiting for love. Life continues and dealing with every day tasks is the real gift. Each individual has his or her own path, and the rest of the family bands together to support that journey.  Marriage, divorce, children, alternative lifestyles and work are all on the horizon as Alex explores the ORIENT. But the universe has its own plans for her, including new lovers, new friends and new discoveries all come into her life to direct her to the ordained plane.  And then there is Jason....  The unseen is working its magic, and there are plenty around who interpret it all for us. Everything matters.  Come join the family...
author: Emilia I. Rutigliano
